sliceClicked.description:
Event which is raised when a slice is clicked.
 Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
 Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igFunnelChart.
 Use ui.index to obtain index of clicked slice.
 Use ui.item to obtain reference to clicked slice item.
 Use ui.selected to check if slice became selected.

allowSliceSelection.description: Gets or sets whether to allow slices to be selected.

bezierPoints.description:
Gets or sets values for upper and lower bezier points. That option has effect only when useBezierCurve is enabled.
    Value should provide 4 numeric values in range from 0 to 1 separated by space character.
    The first number defines upper-x position, second: upper-y, third: lower-x, fourth: lower-y.
    The null or invalid value will reset internal default, which is "0.5 0 0.5 1".
    Example:
    bezierPoints: "0.4 0.1 0.6 1"

bottomEdgeWidth.description: Gets or sets the percentage (from near 0 to 1) of space the bottom edge of the funnel should take.

brushes.description:
Gets or sets the Brushes property.
 The brushes property defines the palette from which automatically assigned brushes are selected.
 The value provided should be an array of css color strings or JavaScript objects defining gradients. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.

formatInnerLabel.description: Gets or sets the formatter function for inner labels. Function should return string and it takes 3 parameters: 1st-value of item to format, 2nd-index of item within data, 3rd-reference to igFunnelChart.

formatOuterLabel.description: Gets or sets the formatter function for outer labels. Function should return string and it takes 3 parameters: 1st-value of item to format, 2nd-index of item within data, 3rd-reference to igFunnelChart.

funnelSliceDisplay.description: Gets or sets the how the heights of the funnel slices should be configured.

valueOptions.name: uniform
valueOptions.description: The slice heights should be uniform.

valueOptions.name: weighted
valueOptions.description: The slice heights should be weighted by value.

innerLabelMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the InnerLabel mapping property for the current series object.

innerLabelVisibility.description: Gets or sets whether the inner labels are visible.

isInverted.description: Gets or sets if the funnel should be rendered inverted.

legend.description:
Gets or sets the Legend for the chart.
    The value of that option can be a string with the id of existing html element. That element should be empty and it will be used to create igChartLegend widget.
    If element was not found, then new DIV element is created and inserted into parent after chart element.
    Value of that option can be an object with member "element", which contains the id of legend-element.
    In this case, that object also may contain options supported by the igChartLegend widget, such as "width", "height" and events, such as "legendItemMouseLeftButtonDown", "legendItemMouseEnter", etc.
    Examples:
    legend: {}
    legend: "idOfDiv"
    legend: { element: "idOfDiv", width: 300 }
    legend: { legendItemMouseLeftButtonDown: function (evt, ui) { ui.chart.toggleSelection(ui.item); } }

The value of that option can be a string with the id of existing html element. That element should be empty and it will be used to create igChartLegend widget.
    If element was not found, then new DIV element is created and inserted into parent after chart element.
    Value of that option can be an object with member "element", which contains the id of legend-element.
    In this case, that object also may contain options supported by the igChartLegend widget, such as "width", "height" and events, such as "legendItemMouseLeftButtonDown", "legendItemMouseEnter", etc.
    Examples:
    legend: {}
    legend: "idOfDiv"
    legend: { element: "idOfDiv", width: 300 }
    legend: { legendItemMouseLeftButtonDown: function (evt, ui) { ui.chart.toggleSelection(ui.item); } }

outerLabelAlignment.description: Gets or sets which side of the chart the outer labels should appear.

valueOptions.name: left
valueOptions.description: The labels will be displayed to the left of the chart.

valueOptions.name: right
valueOptions.description: The labels will be displayed to the right of the chart.

outerLabelMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the OuterLabel mapping property for the current series object.

outerLabelVisibility.description: Gets or sets whether the outer labels are visible.

outlines.description:
Gets or sets the Outlines property.
 The Outlines property defines the palette from which automatically assigned Outlines are selected.
 The value provided should be an array of css color strings or JavaScript objects defining gradients. Optionally the first element can be a string reading "RGB" or "HSV" to specify the interpolation mode of the collection.

outlineThickness.description: Gets or sets the thickness of outline around slices.

selectedSliceStyle.description:
Gets or sets the style to use for selected slices.
 That can be used to set stroke (outline color), fill (background color) and opacity.

fill.description: Defines the fill color of the selected slice

stroke.description: Defines the stroke color of the selected slice

strokeThickness.description: Defines the fill stroke thickness of the selected slice

opacity.description: Defines the opacity of the selected slice

transitionDuration.description: Gets or sets how long the animations should take to run.

unselectedSliceStyle.description:
Gets or sets the style to use for unselected slices.
 That can be used to set stroke (outline color), fill (background color) and opacity.

fill.description: Defines the fill color of the selected slice

stroke.description: Defines the stroke color of the selected slice

strokeThickness.description: Defines the fill stroke thickness of the selected slice

opacity.description: Defines the opacity of the selected slice

useBezierCurve.description: Gets or sets whether to use a bezier curve to define the funnel.

useOuterLabelsForLegend.description: Gets or sets whether to use the outer labels to identify the legend items.

useUnselectedStyle.description: Gets or sets whether to use the unselected style on unselected slices.

valueMemberPath.description: Gets or sets the value member path for the funnel chart.
